bibl.title: Books, Literacy, and Christian Communities. On two Recent Books by Roger S. Bagnall.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Roger S. Bagnall, Livres chrétiens antiques d'Égypte = École pratique des hautes Études. IVe Section, Sciences historiques et philologiques. III. Hautes Études du monde gréco-romain. 44 (Genève, 2009) = Early Christian Books in Egypt (Princeton - Oxford, 2009); - Everyday Writing in the Graeco-Roman East = Sather Classical Lectures. 69. The Joan Palevsky Imprint in Classical Literature (Berkeley - Los Angeles - London, 2011).
bibl.seg: Wipszycka Ewa, Books, Literacy, and Christian Communities. On two Recent Books by Roger S. Bagnall.
